definition: heavy pin having a head at one end and the other end being hammered flat after being passed through holes in the pieces that are fastened together, direct one's attention on something
details:
noun
- heavy pin having a head at one end and the other end being hammered flat after being passed through holes in the pieces that are fastened together
- ornament consisting of a circular rounded protuberance (as on a vault or shield or belt)
= synonyms: stud
verb
- direct one's attention on something
- hold (someone's attention)
= example: hold (someone's attention)
- fasten with a rivet or rivets
